title: How did you get your knowledge?
transcript: is can each speaker inform us or Canim inform us of how he retains the knowledge that he has learned how you remember I don't know it's it's a blessing of Allah first of all and secondly I think that practice makes perfect when you are indulg in answering questions and in in giving lectures and preparing Friday you have to keep on researching and reading and and and and looking all the time and this with the grace of Allah it it remains alhamdulillah
